aboutVenue.name: Villa College
aboutVenue.description: Students of Villa College are provided a high-quality education and are able to make use of exclusive benefits such as a well-networked industry engagement, enhanced learning support, and dedicated student support services. With a strong emphasis on academic strength, Villa College provides a challenging and rewarding learning environment that prepares students for success in their chosen fields. Villa College is a pioneering academic institution, with over 150+ reputed programmes, all delivered by accomplished faculty members. With affiliations and partnerships from around the world, our students can experience world-class education right beside the famed and beautiful orchid gardens and fountains of QI campus. Through our industry engagement, students have access to real-world experience and networking opportunities that can enhance their career prospects and employability. The College also organises events such as Career Fairs and Exposure trips to help students gain experience, guidance, and in-depth knowledge of possible career paths, which in turn helps them make the best decision for their futures. The learning support services provided by Villa College include peer assisted learning and academic advising, and are designed to help students succeed in their programmes. The student support services team is also committed to creating an inclusive and supportive environment that fosters a sense of community and encourages personal growth.

howToReach.details: Take a flight to Velana International Airport (MLE) in Malé, Maldives
From Villa International Airport, you can either take a taxi/a short ferry/public bus to reach Villa College's campus.
